meanings.definition: A woman holding the rank of baron in the British peerage.
meanings.sent1: The baronesses attended the royal ball in elegant gowns.
meanings.sent2: The baronesses inherited vast estates from their fathers.
meanings.sent3: The baronesses giggled as they tried on extravagant hats.
meanings.sent4: The baronesses ruled over their lands with grace and wisdom.
meanings.sent5: The baronesses' presence at the event was truly regal.

meanings.definition: The wife or widow of a baron.
meanings.sent1: The baronesses supported their husbands in all endeavors.
meanings.sent2: The baronesses' loyalty to their spouses was unwavering.
meanings.sent3: The baronesses playfully teased each other during tea time.
meanings.sent4: The baronesses' love shone brightly in their eyes.
meanings.sent5: The baronesses' devotion was evident to all who knew them.
